item.title: valencia; 2025, april, 5
item.description: the d/acc autistic kids are building a balanced new world , and you're welcome to become a t*tree*ee in the dark forest

item.title: paris; 2025, march, 29
item.description: quantumpunk cypherpunk 2.0-3.0-4.0-punk rioterpunk samuraipunk transpunk loverpunk latampunk calipunk oldschoolpunk OGpunk life is short; love is vast heal things; move fast

item.title: kreuzberg; 2025, march, 14
item.description: such a productive and fun week (did you harness the eclipse energy or just enjoy it with *popcorn*?) architecting, building systems, managing teams, coding, debugging... are my favorite things but they are also things where i find emotional comfort (could you guess my moon sign *moon*?) (and seeing all my new & old friends thriving and dacc-ing gives me much blissfulness)

item.title: denver; 2025, march, 1
item.description: (i want to fully focus on my work and personal life) i've been thinking about this idea for over two years but the timing or the circumstances were never right now, they are - the planets have finally aligned *smile**planet* it's time to build, be happy, and be free [(zAMA)^2]B

item.title: alexandria; 2025, february, 22
item.description: happy end of mars retrograde and "222-day", my dear anons. i've missed you! our pilgrimage to egypt, led by the amazing dr. sledge , was a once-in-a-lifetime experience the entire tale is now published at saturnus.tv , i hope you enjoy it - now, onto the new adventure *cat*

item.title: cairo; 2025, february, 16
item.description: happy saint valentine's weekend , my dear anons today on "where in the world is bt3gl sandiego" , we take a trip to the sacred cemetery of the workers who built the giza pyramid complex no, the pyramids were not built by aliens *roll*; they were built by workmen buried right next to it - at a lesser-known part of the giza plateau

item.title: hamburg; 2025, february, 7
item.description: this week's motto was don't cancel yourself; become uncancellable one block at a time , we're building a reality only imagined before every week a new fun(ny) game - but hey it's friday , fam *heart* - milord

item.title: hamburg; 2025, february, 4
item.description: had such a good dream last night, i'm still smiling things are about to (d)accelerate exponentially, and i'm ready heads down building on a party with robots x1 + x2 + ... + xn, where n->infinity (and lex is in his essence in this episode )

item.title: hamburg; 2025, february, 3
item.description: happy monday, anon; it's going to be a good week and it's going to be a golden future here we go again , folks; how many times have we been through this ? welcome to crypto *smoke*

item.title: hamburg; 2025, february, 1
item.description: (do you guys feel the energy shift? are you guys ready for an amazing spring and summ3r? are you getting ready to feel the magick in every atom of your vessel?)

item.title: hamburg; 2025, january, 22
item.description: red curtains, blue velvets, magick boxes and keys, special agents and donuts champ... you were just... too weird ... just too weird... and this is one of the reasons why you are one of my top 3 directors , d (sharing the throne in my heart with tarantino and kubrick) tell k i say hi, and have a nice cup of percentheave(n)ly chocolate milkshake for me (hope it's as good as bobs')

item.title: hamburg; 2025, january, 16
item.description: happy new year, fellow human don't let fear prevail - kindness is wisdom it's going to be okay, don't forget who you are

item.title: alki beach; 2025, january, 1
item.description: happy new year, fellow human don't let fear prevail - kindness is wisdom it's going to be okay, don't forget who you are
